infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: SmartPocketBuddy uses contacts to let you quickly choose an emergency contact.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: SmartPocketBuddy uses your location to share it with your emergency contact when you use Safety Mode.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: SmartPocketBuddy uses the microphone to record when you choose to record during a safety event.

plugins.contactsPermission: Allow SmartPocketBuddy to access your contacts so you can quickly choose an emergency contact.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: SmartPocketBuddy uses your location to share it with your emergency contact when you use Safety Mode.

plugins.cameraPermission: SmartPocketBuddy uses the camera to record video during safety events when you enable it in settings.
plugins.microphonePermission: SmartPocketBuddy uses the microphone when recording video.
